metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22885 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A possible information disclosure / unintended method executionvulnerability in Action Pack >= 2.0.0 when using the `redirect_to` or`polymorphic_url`helper with untrusted user input.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
